title: 3.5 Kg of heroin seized in Grandpass; 27-year-old arrested
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 27-year-old man was arrested for the possession of 3.5 kg of heroin in Grandpass on Friday (3).
The suspect is a resident of Colombo 15 & will be produced to the Maligakanda Magistrate’s Court on Friday (3).
The arrest was made following a raid carried out by the Police Narcotic Bureau.
